price: ߒ߬ߠߎ߫ ߟߋ߫ ߞߊ߬ ߘߎߢߊ߫ ߛߊ߲ ߡߊߛߌ߬ߘߌ߫ ߟߏ߬ߟߏ ߡߊ߬ߢߍ߯ߙߍ ߟߎ߬ ߟߊ߫
arabic: إِنَّا زَيَّنَّا ٱلسَّمَآءَ ٱلدُّنۡيَا بِزِينَةٍ ٱلۡكَوَاكِبِ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: innā zayyannā al-samāa al-dun'yā bizīnatin al-kawākibi
